entry.title: Vegan Karupatti Mysorepak
entry.summary:
Vendor: pettikadai.in
Type:
Price: 270.00

Introducing Vegan Karupatti Mysorepak, a delicious twist on a beloved South Indian classic that's kind to your taste buds and the environment. Our Vegan Karupatti Mysorepak is a compassionate treat made with plant-based ingredients and the wholesome goodness of Karupatti (Palm Jaggery). It captures the traditional flavors of Mysorepak while being entirely free of animal products. Whether you're a vegan food enthusiast or simply love indulging in cruelty-free sweets, our Vegan Karupatti Mysorepak is the perfect choice. Order now to savor the rich, sweet essence of South India, guilt-free."

Ingredients

Chickpea Flour, Palm Jaggery, Oil and Cardamom.

entry.title: Vegan Dry Fruits Ladoo
entry.summary:
Vendor: pettikadai.in
Type:
Price: 290.00

Introducing Vegan Ladoo, a power-packed treat that fuels your taste buds and aligns with your values. Our Vegan  Ladoo is a superhero-inspired sweet delight crafted with all-natural, plant-based ingredients. It delivers the same burst of energy and flavor as the traditional version but without any animal products.  Order now and experience the strength and deliciousness in every bite, all in a cruelty-free, vegan form

Ingredients

Watermelon Seeds, Dates, Groundnuts, Cashews, Cucumber Seeds, Pumpkin Seeds and Khus-Khus.

entry.title: Vegan Kaju Katali
entry.summary:
Vendor: pettikadai.in
Type:
Price: 440.00

"Introducing Vegan Kaju Katli, a pure delight that's both kind to your taste buds and the planet. Our Vegan Kaju Katli is a guilt-free twist on the traditional Indian sweet, made with premium cashews and plant-based ingredients. It offers the same rich, creamy, and melt-in-your-mouth experience without any animal products. Whether you're vegan or simply looking for a cruelty-free indulgence, our Vegan Kaju Katli is the perfect choice. Order now and savor the exquisite taste of cashews in a compassionate, dairy-free form."

Ingredients

Cashew, Jaggery, Cardamom and Coconut Oil.

entry.title: Vegan Mysorepak
entry.summary:
Vendor: pettikadai.in
Type:
Price: 230.00

Introducing Vegan Mysorepak, a compassionate twist on the classic South Indian delight. Our Vegan Mysorepak captures the authentic flavors of traditional Mysorepak without any animal ingredients. It's a mouthwatering blend of premium plant-based ingredients, crafted with the same love and care as the original. Enjoy the sweet, buttery goodness with a clear conscience, as our Vegan Mysorepak is kind to animals and kind to your taste buds. Order now to experience the time-honored taste of Mysorepak in a vegan, cruelty-free form."

Ingredients

Chickpea Flour, Coconut Milk, Palm Jaggery, Sugar, Oil and Cardamom.

entry.title: Vegan Elaneer Halwa
entry.summary:
Vendor: pettikadai.in
Type:
Price: 240.00

Indulge in the delightful world of flavors with our Vegan Elaneer Halwa – a mouthwatering dessert that's as kind to your taste buds as it is to the planet. Made with love and the finest ingredients, our Elaneer Halwa is a guilt-free treat that'll satisfy your sweet cravings while keeping your conscience clear.

Why Choose Our Vegan Elaneer Halwa?

Plant-Based Goodness: Our elaneer halwa is 100% plant-based, free from dairy and animal products. We've carefully crafted this dessert to ensure everyone, regardless of dietary preferences, can enjoy its delectable taste.

Pure Coconut Bliss: We use fresh coconut and wheat milk as the base for our Elaneer Halwa, giving it a rich and creamy texture that's both satisfying and luxurious.

Delicate Aromas: With hints of cashew our elaneer halwa is a symphony of fragrances that add depth and complexity to the flavor.

Handcrafted with Love: Each batch of our Elaneer Halwa is lovingly prepared to perfection, ensuring a consistent, high-quality taste in every bite.

Whether you're a Vegan, have dietary restrictions, or simply appreciate delicious sweets, our Vegan Elaneer Halwa is a dessert that's sure to impress. Order yours today and treat yourself to the delightful world of Vegan indulgence!

Ingredients

Wheat Milk, Jaggery , Tender coconut water, tender coconut pieces, coconut oil, cashews and cardamom .
